Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Relates to the treatment of certain deductions allowable under the internal revenue code in calculating federal adjusted gross income
Summary: Provides that certain deductions allowable under the internal revenue code related to certain types of property and domestic research or experimental expenditures shall be added to federal adjusted gross income.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the treatment of certain deductions allowable under the internal revenue code in calculating federal adjusted gross income
